org.jcvlib.core

Class Color

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jcvlib.core.Color

  • public class Color
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains all color values of some pixel.
    Author:
    Dmitriy Zavodnikov (d.zavodnikov@gmail.com)

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static double COLOR_MAX_VALUE
      Bounds of color value -- maximum value.
      static double COLOR_MIN_VALUE
      Bounds of color values -- minimum value.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Color(double[] colorValues)
      Create empty color and initialize it by given float-point color values (from interval [0.0, 1.0]).
      Color(int numOfChannels)
      Create empty color.
      Color(int numOfChannels, double value)
      Create empty color and initialize all channels by given value (from interval [0.0, 255.0]).

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Color copy()
      Return copy of current color.
      boolean equals(java.lang.Object object)
      Return true if current color equivalent to object from parameter and false otherwise.
      boolean equals(java.lang.Object object, double precision)
      Return true if current color equivalent to object from parameter and false otherwise.
      double euclidDist(Color c)
      Calculate normalize (all values between COLOR_MIN_VALUE and COLOR_MAX_VALUE) Euclidean distance between 2 colors.
      double get(int channel)
      Return value (from interval [0.0, 255.0]) of color from given channel number.
      int getNumOfChannels()
      Return number channels of current color.
      void set(int channel, double value)
      Set value (from interval [0.0, 255.0]) of color to given channel number.
      java.lang.String toString()
      Return string with values of this channel.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

        Links:
        1. Euclidean distance -- Wikipedia.

      • equals

        public boolean equals(java.lang.Object object)
        Return true if current color equivalent to object from parameter and false otherwise.

        Uses JCV.PRECISION_MAX by default.

        Overrides:
        equals in class java.lang.Object

      • equals

        public boolean equals(java.lang.Object object,
             double precision)
        Return true if current color equivalent to object from parameter and false otherwise.
        Parameters:
        object - Object for compare with current color.
        precision - Precision for compare values of pixels.

      • copy

        public Color copy()
        Return copy of current color.

        It will be a REAL COPY of current color!
